Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="SN_Update" VariableValue="Ayehu NG started working on the NT Patching Automation as part of the Change (%change%) and CTASK (%ctask%).

The CI’s consider for NT Patching are “%CI%”.

NT Patching Automation consist of 2 Phases and below are the details of each phase :-

Phase-1 - Consist of Total 9 stages and below are the stage details :-

Stage-1 : Log Directory validation
Stage-2 : CI Directory Fully validation 
Stage-3 : Imported SCCM module Site Code CHP
Stage-4 : Validate the Collection for duplicates
Stage-5 : Create the Collection
Stage-6 : Move Collection to Directory
Stage-7 : Add the list of machines to the collection
Stage-8 : Software Deployment Creation 
Stage-9 : Deployment Validation
 
Phase-2 – Deployment status monitoring for the Collection (%CollectionName%).

Thanks,
Ayehu NG Admin" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" label="Set Memory" description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" notes="" /> <SNCreateRecord x:Name="snCreateRecord18" activityLicenseType="1" id="243" name="SNCreateRecord" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:05:00" TimeInSeconds="300" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="SN Create Record" Description="Creates a new Service Now record" SelectedModuleID="19" SelectedModuleName="ServiceNow" FormId="6dd39c3b-122e-4632-81e3-9afd9418fb60" FormName_UI="CTASK EyeShare Automation Imports(u_ctask_eyeshare_automation_imports)" FormName="CTASK EyeShare Automation Imports(u_ctask_eyeshare_automation_imports)" XMLTableResult="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><Settings><Settings Number="%ctask%" /><Settings EyeShareIndexName="Number" /><Settings Additional___comments="%SN_Update%" /></Settings>" SelectedModuleType="24" HostName="{x:Null}" HostId="0" TypeName="SNCreateRecord" label="SN Create Record" description="Creates a new Service Now record" notes="" /> <SendEmail x:Name="sendEmail8" activityLicenseType="1" id="69" name="SendEmail" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" TypeName="SendEmail" HostId="-2" ShiftLevelCc="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" HostName="" TemplateNumber="0" DisplayName="Send Email" Timeout="00:00:00" Body="<p>Hi All,</p><p><br></p><p>Ayehu NG started working on the NT Patching Automation as part of the Change (%change%) and CTASK (%ctask%).</p><p><br></p><p>The CI’s consider for NT Patching are “%CI%”- %ActualCINumber%</p><p><br></p><p>NT Patching Automation consist of 2 Phases and below are the details of each phase :-</p><p><br></p><p>Phase-1 -
